content.rendered:
Delivering EXCELLENCE in all we do.

Since its humble beginning in 1937, Alticor Inc has grown as a family of hard-working individuals into a world-class builder. Exploring new markets and partnerships, investing in diversity and our communities, and forging new opportunities, we are dedicated to serving our people, our neighbors, our partners and all those who aspire to build a better future.

Alticor Inc is committed to continuing our legacy—not only through brick and mortar landmarks but through the integrity of our team members. Through the years, these core values have represented our company as well as each individual that make our projects possible: Ownership, Integrity, Builder, Diversity and Community. These values, paired with our ambitious vision and drive to succeed, are what define Alticor Inc and will ensure our continued growth and EXCELLENCE for generations to come.
